name: Door-O-Bot
description:
You're a robot in the year 3030. You were constructed to open doors for people. They gave you an AI to learn how to open doors, but you developed a need for freeedom. You need to escape from Doors n' Stuff Inc. to start a new life!

Instructions

Arrow keys or WASD - movement

Z - push switch/access terminal/select item

X - cancel terminal

Enter - Open menu

Side note

Music might play in the wrong order in the browser version.

===============

8x8 Game Jam 2 Entry

Source Code and Assets
